name: Ni CRM Lead
author: anzia

sections.description:
Ni CRM Lead is a straightforward WordPress plugin designed to streamline lead creation. It efficiently maintains customer or vendor information along with follow-up history. This plugin enables you to easily store customer inquiries for various services and products, enhancing organization and efficiency.

Some Features.

  • Fast And Easy Install
  • Add New Customer
  • Add New Inquiry
  • Add Update, Delete Follow Up
  • Add new Follow up
  • Add, Delete, Service, Product and status

Feedback

  • We are open to your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying out one of our plugins.

Support email:support@naziinfotech.com
sections.installation:
1. Use the WordPress plugin installer or upload files to WordPress plugin directory.
  2. Activate plugin from admin panel.
  3. Refer image for more detail.
sections.faq:
Where i can get help?

Click on support tab or email:support@naziinfotech.com

Do you customize this plugin?

Yes, as per requirement we can customize this plugin.
